meanings.definition: To take on a task or responsibility
meanings.sent1: She undertook the project with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent2: He has undertaken the role of team leader.
meanings.sent3: The cat undertook the mission of catching the elusive mouse.
meanings.sent4: The student undertook the challenge of solving the difficult math problem.
meanings.sent5: Undertaking the responsibility, she ensured the event ran smoothly.

meanings.sent1: The undertaken project was a success.
meanings.sent2: The undertaken task was completed on time.
meanings.sent3: The undertaken journey led them to unexpected places.
meanings.sent4: The undertaken effort resulted in a beautiful outcome.
meanings.sent5: The undertaken responsibility was handled with care.

meanings.definition: To begin or attempt to do something
meanings.sent1: They undertook the adventure of climbing the mountain.
meanings.sent2: She has undertaken learning a new language.
meanings.sent3: The robot undertook the task of cleaning the entire house.
meanings.sent4: Undertaking the challenge, he started his own business.
meanings.sent5: The team undertook the mission of winning the championship.
